column4: I don't suppose anyone knows off the top of their head which commands I need to run to reconfigure the nvidia kernel module.
I just changed to the k7 specific kernel, and currently x won't boot with the "nvidia" driver.
it's failing on the kernel module.  I know on fedora I just re-ran the .run script, but I have no idea where apt puts such things.
Ells, I've got Crossover running.
hoary,
Ells, I'm also running Transgaming 4.3
dont they call that cedega now?
you may have to restart gnome to get apps populating your menu list
you should sell all your belongings, and send the proceeds to my bank account so I can hire my legions of doom, and take over the world.
my wife doesnt like that idea very much.
My wife wouldn't like it if the tables were reversed, but she did laugh.
maybe we should go in together, and be joint evil overlords?
that has a nice ring to it, what are you two doing for brunch next tuesday? I'll have my evil horde call your evil horde.
heh.
Mmmm... as evil overlord I could lart them all...
where roughly in the world are ya
what type of tech's?
I would guess mostly winders admin types, and desktop support types, but.....

I was on vacation, so I didn't really ask too many questions.  I know tech types in Calgary make a lot more then those working for same company, in the same job title, in SaskatALFDAJDFLAOVIEHJAOLJKAWE (since I can't spell it anyway)

yeah, thats pretty typical. I think Linux is much bigger in eastern Canada. Too bad I live in BC though. We are a bit alienated from the rest of our country (too many damn empty provinces full of wheat fields between us and New York!)
Im surprised they even know what computers are in Saskachewan.
I was in Okotoks??  (about 30km south of Calgary) feb 12-20
I vote for Absenth
